Text:
My best friend (from Canada) turned me on to these; addictive isn't a strong enough word. REAL cheese, not sprayed-on dehydrated cheese flavored chemicals! When you first open the bag, the powerful cheese aroma hits you right where you live.

One word of warning: bookmark this store, because once you have Hawkin's Cheesies you will never want to sully your tastebuds with any other cheese snack. Ever.
